name: Chase of Illusion
description:
Chase of Illusion is a 2D shooting platformer, in which the player will take an adventure in the mysterious land owned by one of the goddesses of this world. Players will need to collect skills, and fight enemies and bosses to get out of the world.

Made for USC IMGD CTIN-532 Interactive Design and Production I.

Game Designers: Bocheng Yao / Suli Zhang

Artist: Suli Zhang
Portfolio Website: https://sulizhang.wixsite.com/portfolio

Programmer: Bocheng Yao

Composers: Amy Yu / Jennifer Xing / Ryan X. Messcher

Sound Designers: Eric Treadwell / Kensington Watts
